meanings.definition: Covered with a pattern of flowers or foliage.
meanings.sent1: The flory wallpaper in the room added a cheerful touch.
meanings.sent2: Her dress had a flory design that reminded me of a garden.
meanings.sent3: The flory curtains made the room feel like a blooming garden.
meanings.sent4: The flory carpet transformed the space into a floral paradise.
meanings.sent5: The flory decorations made the party venue look like a flower garden.

meanings.definition: A design or pattern of flowers or foliage.
meanings.sent1: She admired the intricate flory on the vase.
meanings.sent2: The flory on the tablecloth was delicate and beautiful.
meanings.sent3: The flory on the wrapping paper made the gift even more special.
meanings.sent4: The flory on the china plates added elegance to the table setting.
meanings.sent5: The flory on the wallpaper brought a touch of nature indoors.

meanings.sent1: The flory garden was a riot of colors and scents.
meanings.sent2: The flory meadow was a breathtaking sight in the spring.
meanings.sent3: The flory field looked like a painting come to life.
meanings.sent4: The flory landscape was a paradise for bees and butterflies.
meanings.sent5: The flory hillside was a vibrant tapestry of blooms.
